blocks.name: lmodvsmdi
blocks.content: Multiple distributive law for scalar product (left-distributivity). (Contributed by AV, 5-Sep-2019.)

  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c9)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(.g ` c0)

} = {
  impcom(c0 ‚àà LMod, (c1 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c4 ‚àà c5), (c1[c6](c3[c7]c4))=((c3[c8]c1)[c6]c4))

blocks.name: gsumlsscl
blocks.content: Closure of a group sum in a linear subspace: A (finitely supported) sum of scalar multiplications of vectors of a subset of a linear subspace is also contained in the linear subspace. (Contributed by AV, 20-Apr-2019.) (Revised by AV, 28-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
